fields.summary: Unable to launch public BFEBS image from account other than the one who owns the snap

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Use case:

There is an image registered as public that is backed by and EBS snapshot. I would like to allow users in other accounts than my own to launch that image.

Issue:
Permissions for the snap are being checked at time of volume creation for the BFEBS instance and the check is denied for the account that does not own the snapshot. Any snapshot registered as an image is a special case of snapshot that must be allowed to be shared across accounts.

fields.summary: CLONE - Unable to launch public BFEBS image from account other than the one who owns the snap

comments.body: Known Issue: EBS backed images created/registered by one account will not be executable by users in a different account.
Closing out this resolved bug.  Please re-open if you continue to see an issue in the docs.
